title: Rolls-Royce
description: The unmistakable colors of Rolls-Royce embody sophistication and prestige, with deep hues like '680021', an emblematic maroon that evokes the brand's majestic history, paired with 'FFFAEC', a subtle off-white that signifies elegance. The palette is rounded out by '939598', a timeless gray, and '000000', representing the brand's classic and bold approach. These colors capture the essence of luxury and are prominently featured in Rolls-Royce's branding and motorcars.
